en-US.summary: Helper for Path of Exile which allows you to price check items and find the rewards for quests.
examplePhrases: Alexa, ask p. o. e. for the price of a Mirror of Kalandra
Alexa, ask p. o. e. for the price of twenty five Exalted Orbs in Standard league
Alexa, ask p. o. e. for the price of a six linked Loreweave
en-US.name: Path of Exile Helper
en-US.description:
This is helper for Path of Exile by Grinding Gear Games. It can check the price of an item, or lookup a quest reward.

Current items supported for price checking: Currency, fragments, divination cards, prophecies, skill gems, maps, unique maps, unique jewels, unique flasks, unique weapons, unique armors, unique accessories.

You can include the league in all queries. If no league is specified, it will default to the current temporary challenge league.

# Currency

Required: item name
Optional: quantity, league

"What is the price of ten Exalted Orbs in Incursion league?"

# Linked items

Required: item name
Optional: links, league

"What is the price of a six linked Loreweave in Standard?"

# Skill gems

Required: item name, level
Optional: quality, league

"What is the price of a twenty one twenty three Kinetic Blast in Hardcore Incursion league?"

# Other items

Required: item name
Optional: league

"What is the price of a Headhunter in Incursion?"


This skill is fan-made and not affiliated with Grinding Gear Games in any way.

publishingInformation.testingInstructions:
The purpose of the skill is to price check items, and to check the rewards for quests.

Here is how to check the reward of a quest:
- "What is the quest reward for The Dweller of the Deep?"

You can find the full list of quests here [1].

Here is how to check the price of an item:
- "What is the price of an Exalted Orb?"
- "What is the price of one hundred fusings in Standard league?"
- "What is the price of a six linked Loreweave?"
- "What is the price of a twenty one twenty three Kinetic Blast?"

Most items found on this page [2] are available for price checking.

[1]: https://pathofexile.gamepedia.com/Quest_Rewards
[2]: https://poe.ninja/challenge/currency
